考早呀屌佢老母

成績動盪加上換帥，巴塞很有可能會在今夏迎來大換血。雖然球會表示，今年夏天球隊在轉會市場上的簽約動作不會太多，但是新人的到來，無疑會讓一些老臣離去。

　　《馬卡報》就對此面向巴塞球迷做了一項調查，問題就是，如果自己是巴塞體育總監羅伯特・費南迪斯，他們最希望誰離開巴塞。

　　調查結果顯示，安達-高美斯、艾達-杜蘭、馬菲奧和馬西普是球迷心目中，最想清洗掉的球員。前面的三名球員在自己的出場時間內，並沒有拿出足夠有說服力的表現，因此很多人希望他們被清洗掉。

　　而馬西普的情況則有所不同，他在過去的幾個賽季一直擔任球隊的第三門將，幾乎得不到出場的機會。巴塞方面將不會同他續約，6月份合約到期的他將會成為自由球員。

　　另外，對於拉芬拿、丹尼斯-蘇亞雷斯以及比高，球迷們大多都投了支持票，儘管他們三人今季得到的出場時間不多，但是依然得到了大部分球迷的肯定。（Marco）

毒撚仲多票過PACO

夏窗將至，和其他球隊一樣，巴塞需要開始對球隊陣容進行增刪，必然會有新人加入，也肯定將有老將離開。在所有可能離開的球員中，後衛馬菲奧是最可能被清洗的那個。

自從巴塞作客0-3不敵祖雲達斯的歐冠盃比賽以來，馬菲奧再也沒能獲得哪怕一分鐘的出場時間，官方對此的解釋是馬菲奧有傷，但是按照西班牙媒體的報導，馬菲奧已經被安歷基攻入冷宮，「他已經踢完了自己在巴塞的最後一場比賽」，這是西媒的說法。

根據西媒的報導，馬菲奧的合約將會在2018年到期，巴塞不但不打算和他續約，還願意免費放他離隊，但是這位33歲的老將並不打算離開巴塞，根據BeIn體育的消息，馬菲奧想要在巴塞履行完最後一年的合約，這樣一來，巴塞如果想要擺脫掉馬菲奧，就只有買斷其合約一條路可走。

2014年夏天，馬菲奧從華倫西亞加盟巴塞，當時的轉會費為2000萬歐元。

不配巴塞波衫！他是如何混到現在？

　　另外，對於拉芬拿、丹尼斯-蘇亞雷斯以及比高，球迷們大多都投了支持票，儘管他們三人今季得到的出場時間不多，但是依然得到了大部分球迷的肯定。（Marco）

Pique: "Lucho deserves a good final. He is one of our best coaches we ever had. We hope to give him his last title with us."

"My health? I'm fine. I'm training and ready for tomorrow to play."

"Fav moment with Lucho? All the titles and also his coaching with us in the dressing room. He won all of us."

"Lucho doesn't have a good relationship to you (the press) but with us it was very very good."

"Alaves will defend. We have to be alert. We will have the ball a lot but we have to be careful with our back line."

"My tweet about the media? When I want to talk about it I will in the coming months. My new project."

"I always speak about the news? It's just a coincidence that's it's me talking. In some cases we have to defend ourselves."

"Sometimes we have to talk about the media and sometimes we keep silent."

"Alaves at Camp Nou won? We won 6-0 against them too. But don't use the results to predict."

"I'm the club's spokesman? No. There are decisions that the team make and there are specific cases where I like to speak out."

"Madrid vs Juve? I'm focused on our final tomorrow then we will talk about UCL. May the best team win UCL win, I hope it's Juve."

"Whoever wins UCL doesn't affect Barcelona or our season."

"Everyone hates Barça? No. The refs did have an influence but I won't look for specific cases. RM won the league. Turn the page."

"VAR? we'll see if they use it."

"To win la Liga you have to be good. We messed up a few games and sometimes there were other influences. Doesn't matter now."

"All the legal actions this week? It all came at once. There's many cases related to the club. Rosell etc."

"Rosell? The justice system will deal with him."

"Neymar and Leo tax? Other teams have the same problems. I had the same problem. It's not nice to see."

"CB's failed here? Umtiti is very good. He is confident and he is a great defender."

"Umtiti will learn and he will get more confidence. His career can mimic mine and he can be here for many years."

"Fans not motivated? The players are. We can't control the fans. Tomorrow we will play a great game- you'll see."

"Suarez? An important absence but won't affect us. Paco does a good job. He will be fine."

"Sergi and Masche absent? We have good enough players to handle this situation. We have the talent to win."

"Marlon? He could have a good future. Stable player. Fits with our Philosophy."

"Madrid are better now? With VAR there will be more control to see. VAR will take pressure of referees."

"VAR will reduce errors. I'm not bringing excuses for losing the league but we are penalized more than we should be."

"I'm not going over this again. Madrid won the league. No excuses. Turn the page."

位於加泰羅尼亞地區北部的 傑羅納足球隊 成立了超過87年，這支加泰羅尼亞小球會連續征戰西乙9年，但未曾踏觸過西班牙頂級足球聯賽。剛剛週六的西乙第40週賽事，第3位的 基達菲 作客不敵 華拉度列，令位於第2的 傑羅納 只要在今晚對 塔拉戈納 身上取得1分，就能以對賽成績優勢，歷史性升班西甲。

過去4個球季，傑羅納 曾經有3次升班西甲的機會，但一一地錯失。當中14/15球季最為絕佳，當時球隊位於第2，只擊敗無慾無求的 盧高，就能升班，可是補時階段被迫和，把升班資格拱手相讓給 希杭。而12/13和15/16球季，它們都順利晉身西乙升班附加賽決賽，最終兩回合都雙雙敗陣。

傑羅納 的大部球員都來自西乙和數家大球會的借將，當中最有名氣是 國際米蘭 借將前鋒 森梅利朗高 Samuele Longo，他為 傑羅納 貢獻14個入球，是隊中首席射手。而42歲少帥 柏保路馬捷 Pablo Machín 也是來自西乙的 紐文西亞，之前沒有任何執掌西甲或較大球會的經驗。過去2季連續錯失升班機會，仍然得到管理層的信任，是現時西乙中，小有執教長達3年的教練。

傑羅納 的踢球風格著重控球，有興趣的球迷可以於今晚香港時間凌晨零時，見證歷史時刻。

The Italy international has long been associated with a move to Camp Nou but he has argued that he feels settled and wants to win big in France

Marco Verratti expects to stay at Paris Saint-Germain next season, despite an underwhelming season for the club and persistent links with a switch to Barcelona.

The Italy international helped Unai Emery's side win a third domestic competition of 2016-17 in Saturday's 1-0 Coupe de France win over Angers, adding to their Trophee des Champions and Coupe de la Ligue triumphs.

However, the Ligue 1 title was surrendered to Monaco and Champions League success eluded the Parisian club once again, following a record-breaking second-leg collapse against Barcelona in the last 16.

The 24-year-old's agent, Donato Di Campli, said earlier this month that talks would be held after the Coupe de France final, and Verratti was quick off the mark with his thoughts.

"It's the club that decides, but I think I'll be there [next season]," he said. "Afterwards we will talk with the club like every year.

"I still have four years left on my contract and I'm not thinking about leaving. I am very happy to be a part of this project and I have always said that winning with PSG is different from winning with all the other teams because I have been here for five years and I would really like to win something very important here in Paris."

The diminutive playmaker conceded it had been a tough season, but praised Emery for helping to develop his game and expressed his happiness at helping to give departing veteran Maxwell a fitting send-off.

"I think I have made progress," said Verratti. "We have a very demanding coach, who always wants a good game and attack. I think I also improved thanks to him.

"Mentally this season was hard, but I am very happy to finish with a trophy and happy for Max that he can finish with a trophy, he already has many. I am very happy."

【明報專訊】有讀者黃小姐電郵致明報體育版，查問點解「細哨」朗拿甸奴入球後通常會竪起姆指及尾指，然後左右搖晃。這手勢究竟是什麼意思﹖

King Sir不是巴西人，也不明白這個類似牛角的手勢有何意義，於是託朋友問了在港的巴西朋友，他解釋在巴西，竪起姆指就代表好，同時竪起姆指及尾指則表示「無得頂」。其實除了朗拿甸奴外，卡富及卡路士等巴西球員間中都會做出類似手勢慶祝。

講開球員慶祝手勢，可謂層出不窮。阿仙奴前鋒亨利最近入球後便用兩隻手指做了T字，原來是代表把入球獻給愛女「Tea」。

因傷而沒有進入國王盃決賽大名單的馬菲奧，已經決定在今年夏天離開巴塞。

據報導，他在決賽後回程的飛機上向幾位隊友表示經過深思熟慮，他決定在今夏離隊，在飛機上，他請求隊友們在足球上簽名，供自己日後留念，這也被解讀為他去意已決。

在季尾幾乎沒有上陣機會，在決賽慶祝的照片都不見得有他的蹤影，真的要被人遺忘嗎？

上年三月，他代表法國出戰熱身賽時受傷，賽後證實半月右膝半月板撕裂，最嚴重情況是賽季報銷，繼而影響代表法國出戰歐國盃的機會。

他想到球隊前途以至職業生涯，做了一個影響終生決定-切除半月板

他當時表示：為了巴塞同時也為了歐國盃，選擇了最快恢復的方式，或許我到60歲會變成一個傷殘，但這些事情以後再說吧。事實上，切除半月板會縮短康復時間，但會極大縮短運動壽命，而且到老年時雙腿更會大機會報廢。

喊左
